title: (x) Armored Saint logo mediaeval font - Old English, Fette Fraktur {Bart H}
content:
hi to all, someone can help me to identify this font? I can't find a gothic font with the same "a".  
thanx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130420044817im_/http:/typophile.com/files/armored_saint__5453.jpg)
author: rockberto

comments.content: I think this is a combination of two fonts: the uppercase from Cloister Black (or Old English) and the lowercase from Fette Fraktur.

I think you have solved the question!  
(sorry for my english)  
thanx
